title: Bumm-foder or, vvaste-paper proper to wipe the nation's Rump with, or your own.
author: Brome, Alexander, 1620-1666.
notes: Attributed to Alexander Brome by Wing.
Verse: "Free quarter in the North is grown so scarce ..."
At end of text: Finis, In English, The Rump.
Item at A4:2[187] imperfect: mutilated with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
